org.neo4j.logging

Class FormattedLog.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.logging.FormattedLog.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    FormattedLog

    public static class FormattedLog.Builder
extends Object
    A Builder for a FormattedLog

      • toOutputStream

        public FormattedLog toOutputStream(Supplier<OutputStream> outSupplier)
        Creates a FormattedLog instance that writes messages to OutputStreams obtained from the specified Supplier. The OutputStream is obtained from the Supplier before every log message is written.
        Parameters:
        outSupplier - A supplier for an output stream to write to
        Returns:
        A FormattedLog instance

      • toPrintWriter

        public FormattedLog toPrintWriter(Supplier<PrintWriter> writerSupplier)
        Creates a FormattedLog instance that writes messages to PrintWriters obtained from the specified Supplier. The PrintWriter is obtained from the Supplier before every log message is written.
        Parameters:
        writerSupplier - A supplier for a PrintWriter to write to
        Returns:
        A FormattedLog instance that writes to the specified PrintWriter
